attributes.title: The official Review
attributes.review: It’s one of the worst apps ever and whoever coded it should be ashamed of themselves. Trump is a horrible, racist, and Pedophilic man who deserves to go to jail for the rest of his life. PERIOD

attributes.title: ICKY
attributes.review: as soon as i entered the app it told me to go back to my country 😩😩😩 absolutely horrible place, enter at ur own risk

attributes.title: absolutely awful. 🤢
attributes.review: i have never in oh lifetime downloaded and used a worse app, got this app to support our amazing president, because he needs and deserves support for his re-election 🧚🏼‍♀️🥰💗🧝‍♀️ bu i was utterly unsatisfied with this app 🥺😔🙁 we hate to see it

attributes.title: Confused
attributes.review: Instructions for app unclear, I have drop kicked my grandmother out the window

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app my pet balloon died. i will never feel the same towards trump. this app is a sorry excuse of witchcraft. the other reviews are correct. my balloon was my best friend and now it’s gonna forever. dreadful.

attributes.title: awful
attributes.review: really bad interface and horrible network connection abilities. runs about as well as this presidency. hope this app gets fixed soon.

attributes.title: Naked Garfield
attributes.review: I got this app but he had horrible pop ups of  Garfield (the fat Orange cat)  of its nudes it’s was so disturbing horrible do not recommend!!!! 😔😔

attributes.title: app review
attributes.review: horrible app. ask for too much information. FAKE NEWS!!!

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: A very terrible app, I don’t recommend buying it. Absolutely trash

attributes.title: i just wanted to support
attributes.review: i just wanted to support our dear president. i opened this app and immediately it asked for my race. when i said i was arab it continued to make assumptions about me. then donald came out of the app and harassed me. i feel very saddened.
